Name: Umbraco backup allows restore across SQL server versions

Content.summary: 'Umbraco backup allows restore across SQL server versions' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about SQL, XML, Technology Internet written on 10 August 2006
Content.bodyText: Using the Umbraco backup XML mode SQL server restore tool, you can develop a site on your local host running SQL server 2005 express and then migrate that database to SQL 2K on a shared hosting environment with just a couple of quick dos commands (any Umbraco supported version to any other version is fine).
